content: Former Senior Cabinet position in the Government of Singapore The **Coordinating Minister for Infrastructure** was an appointment in the [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore). [Khaw Boon Wan](/wiki/Khaw_Boon_Wan) was the first minister appointed in 2015. ## List of Coordinating Ministers for Infrastructure No.ImageNameTook officeLeft officePolitical party1[Khaw Boon Wan](/wiki/Khaw_Boon_Wan)1 October 201527 July 2020[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) This Singapore-related article is a stub. title: Coordinating Minister for Infrastructure (Singapore)
